author: Huang (2011)
notes: Huang, Quan 黄权. 2011. Chinese-Hlai dictionary (Sai dialect) [汉黎字典(赛方言)]. Kunming: Yunnan People's Press 云南民族出版社.This is the previously undocumented Jiamao dialect of Lingshui County, rather than the previously documented Jiamao dialect of Jiamao Township, Baoting County in Hainan.Note that there are many nominal prefixes such as kɯ³³.
